Jerry Green - Images from the book "A View from the Stage"

A photo of the Green family siblings.   , Contributed by Jerry Green
Fullscreen
A photograph of Annie and Ollie Green, Sr. Parents to Jerry Green.   , Contributed by Jerry Green
Fullscreen
A band photo of the Unhooked Generation. One of the first bands that Jerry Green had major success with.   , Contributed by Jerry Green
Fullscreen
Promotional photo from the early days in Jerry Green's career. From his book "A View from the Stage."  , Contributed by Jerry Green
Fullscreen
Jerry Green, Joyce Stewart and David Peppers with the Unhooked Generation Show Band in the Azores.   , Contributed by Jerry Green
Fullscreen
Jerry Green at the famous "Wall of Gold" inside Muscle Shoals sound studio.   , Contributed by Jerry Green
Fullscreen
Jerry Green at the legendary "Magic Board."   , Contributed by Jerry Green
Fullscreen
Promotional shot for Mr. Wonderful Production's Super Soul Blues, Vol. III  , Contributed by Jerry Green
Fullscreen
A painting of Jerry Green and sister Earlene Green performing "Last Two Dollars" by artist Bettye Brookfield to remember Richard Benson and the popular song by Johnnie Taylor.  Contributed by Jerry Green
Fullscreen
A view of the finishing touches being added at Jerry Green and Friends first location in Louisville, Ky along Brownsboro Road.   , Contributed by Jerry Green
Fullscreen
The sign for Jerry Green and Friends under the sign of the Best Western/Brownsboro Inn, where the nightclub was originally located.   , Contributed by Jerry Green
Fullscreen
Jerry Green with Louisville basketball coach Rick Pitino.   , Contributed by Jerry Green
Fullscreen
Jerry Green, left, with the legendary Wayne Newton.   , Contributed by Jerry Green
Fullscreen
The Platters musical group performing inside Jerry Green and Friends nightclub.   , Contributed by Jerry Green
Fullscreen
The late Robert Davis was a regular at Jerry Green and Friends from the beginning. As a result, Bob was given his own permanently reserved table by Jerry.   , Contributed by Jerry Green
